content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_button
inventory=[{"type": "purple_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft crimson_button, I first need to craft crimson_planks. To craft crimson_planks, I need to move the stripped_crimson_stem at slot 37 into the crafting table. I will choose slot 1.
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_button
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}]
thought: The crimson_planks have been crafted and are in slot 0. I will move them into an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_button
inventory=[{"type": "purple_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I need to craft the crimson_button from the crimson_planks. I will move the crimson_planks into the crafting table (slot 1).
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_button
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
